plays.text: Penalty to Darren McCarty 2 minutes for High Sticking Tyson Nash
Penalty to Pavol Demitra 2 minutes for High Sticking Chris Chelios
Goal scored by Cory Stillman assisted by Jeff Finley and Chris Pronger
Penalty to Tomas Holmstrom 2 minutes for Unsportsmanlike Conduct MARC BERGEVIN
Penalty to Mike Eastwood 2 minutes for Hooking Luc Robitaille
Goal scored by Kris Draper assisted by Nicklas Lidstrom and Kirk Maltby
Penalty to Boyd Devereaux 2 minutes for Crosschecking Jeff Finley
Penalty to MARC BERGEVIN 2 minutes for Holding the Stick Mathieu Dandenault
Goal scored by Steve Yzerman assisted by Sergei Fedorov
Penalty to Darren McCarty 2 minutes for Crosschecking MARC BERGEVIN
Goal scored by Brendan Shanahan assisted by Steve Yzerman and Chris Chelios
Penalty to Kris Draper 2 minutes for Holding Chris Pronger
Penalty to Chris Pronger 2 minutes for Crosschecking Luc Robitaille
Penalty to Fredrik Olausson 2 minutes for Holding Keith Tkachuk
Penalty to Keith Tkachuk 2 minutes for Roughing Fredrik Olausson
Penalty to Kris Draper 2 minutes for Crosschecking Chris Pronger
